attributes.action: I want there not to be another scottish referedum again. Its meant to be over.
attributes.background: Nicola sturgeon and the SNP said that the scottish referedum would be a once in a lifetime and yet now they are trying to have another one. Scotland voted NO are the SNP going to keep going until they get their way? No more talk of independence please we voted to maintain the union.

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/104438

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
